question: A haloalkane undergoes <katex>$S_{N}1$</katex> or <katex>$S_{N}2$</katex> reaction depending on:
explanation: The nature of the solvent strongly influences the mechanism. Polar protic solvents favor <katex>$S_{N}1$</katex> by stabilizing ions, while polar aprotic solvents favor <katex>$S_{N}2$</katex>.
